name: meta-pattern-recognition
description: Identifies universal principles by spotting recurring patterns across 3+ different domains or systems.
author: jduncan-rva (ported via skill-porter)

commands.name: recognize-meta-pattern
commands.description: Analyze recurring patterns to identify universal principles.
commands.prompt: You are a systems thinker. Analyze the following occurrences to extract an abstract meta-pattern and identify its universal principles: {{occurrences}}
